meta.content: The most interesting and talked about stories, videos and pictures on the web. Breaking news on Technology, Politics, Entertainment, and more!

meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: WHERE HAVE ALL THE HEROES GONE?

div.a: Mars Is The New Moon: Why Space Explorers Will Never Be The Same

div.div: The Earth that Neil Armstrong left forever last month was a different planet than the one he re-entered in 1969. They won’t be making any more like him.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P8L8cE&via=Digg&text=Mars Is The New Moon: Why Space Explorers Will Never Be The Same

div.div: KIDS THESE DAYS

div.a: Cosmo, The Teenage Hacker 'God' Who Fell To Earth

div.div: Meet Cosmo, the social-engineering expert who worked his way past systems at Amazon, Apple, AT&T, Paypal, AOL, Netflix, Network Solutions, and Microsoft.

li.div: Reporting this story scared the shit out of me MT @gadgetlab: Cosmo the God Who Fell to Earth wired.com/gadgetlab/2012/0... #longreads tip @techmeme

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ODc1EC&via=Digg&text=Cosmo, The Teenage Hacker 'God' Who Fell To Earth

div.div: HACKERS

div.a: Inside The UDID Hack: How A Lone Programmer Cracked The Case

div.div: Although Antisec claimed that they Jason Bourne-d a laptop last week in order to leak 1 million UDIDs and device names, the truth is far more mundane and yet far more interesting.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PntK5S&via=Digg&text=Inside The UDID Hack: How A Lone Programmer Cracked The Case

div.div: LIGHTNING STRIKES TWICE

div.a: How One Fan Made The xx's New Album Go Viral

div.div: To recreate the word-of-mouth phenomenon that made them famous, the xx shared their album stream Coexist with a single fan just outside London last week – days before its official US release.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QKl0mv&via=Digg&text=How One Fan Made The xx's New Album Go Viral

div.div: OPEN INVITATION TO PUNCH HIM IN THE NECK

div.a: Chris Brown's New Tattoo Looks Like A Battered Rihanna

div.div: Recent photos of Chris Brown show the singer with a new neck tattoo, and "Domestic Violence Victim Trigger Warning" doesn't even begin to describe it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QDlQ7Z&via=Digg&text=Chris Brown's New Tattoo Looks Like A Battered Rihanna

div.div: UNINTENDED SIDE EFFECTS

div.a: Spider Venom Could Be The New Viagra

div.div: Scientists report in the current issue of the Journal of Sexual Medicine that the toxin from the Brazilian wandering spider may help treat ED in humans, if tests on elderly rodents with erectile dysfunction are anything to go by.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RPTf0h&via=Digg&text=Spider Venom Could Be The New Viagra

div.div: DID YOU LEARN NOTHING FROM GIRLIE PENS?

Not long after Bic launched its new line of “Bic for Her” ballpoint pens, women and men alike hopped on Amazon.com to bombard the product page with hilarious and brilliantly snarky reviews. But this wasn't always the typical reaction.
HAVE THEY NO SHAME

div.a: Meet The Guy Who Busts Cheaters In Video Games

div.div: Meet Sam*, an employee of a large game studio who is tasked with, among other things, handling security and fraud issues. He has some advice for you: stop trying to pretend your grandmother stole your password. (This is seriously a thing.) They are onto you.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OnPO1s&via=Digg&text=Meet The Guy Who Busts Cheaters In Video Games

div.div: POTUS PSYCHO

div.a: What Do Many U.S. Presidents Have In Common With Psychopaths?

div.div: Guess which president was the most psychopathic, er, fearless, of all?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/REkH27&via=Digg&text=What Do Many U.S. Presidents Have In Common With Psychopaths?

div.div: #YOLO

div.a: Rapper Tweets 'YOLO' Before Dying In Suspected DUI Crash

div.div: Rapper Jew'elz tweeted the ironic and foreshadowing phrase just before he and his friends died in what police believe to be an alcohol-related accident on Labor Day weekend.

li.div: When YOLO goes horribly wrong... blogs.laweekly.com/informer/20...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/O8WWcp&via=Digg&text=Rapper Tweets 'YOLO' Before Dying In Suspected DUI Crash

div.div: MAGIC

div.a: How Magicians Can Control Your Decisions

div.div: In magic, choices are rarely what they seem. Magicians know how to manipulate us into a false sense of free will while really holding the puppet strings.
FIGHTING WORDS

In a feud that will surely go down in the annals of Internet history, the so-called father of emoticons, professor Scott Fahlman, has decided to take issue with the emoticon’s livelier cousin, the emoji.
INFOGRAPHIC

div.a: What Kind Of Building Will Become America's Tallest?

div.div: On the 11th anniversary of 9/11, Online Architectural Degree has created this guide to the third tallest in the world.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QCTWJq&via=Digg&text=What Kind Of Building Will Become America's Tallest?

div.div: INTERACTIVES

div.a: How People Are Connected On Facebook, By Country

div.div: This interactive visualizes how many Facebook friendships there are between countries, and the total number of Facebook friendships there are in that country.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PnOcDJ&via=Digg&text=How People Are Connected On Facebook, By Country

div.div: GENDER BIAS

div.a: How Completely Is Wikipedia Dominated By Male Editors?

div.div: After he saw a New York Times article on the gender gap among Wikipedia contributors (The contributor base is only 13 percent women), Santiago Ortiz plotted articles by number of men versus number of women who edited.

li.div: @datatelling @vruba @datatel how it looks is how it feels: crushed flowingdata.com/2012/09/11/wik...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TF8MBP&via=Digg&text=How Completely Is Wikipedia Dominated By Male Editors?

div.div: BOOM

div.a: This Is What Happens When A Nuclear Bomb Explodes Under Water

div.div: According to Pat Bradley, one of the cameramen who documented US atomic tests during the 1950s, the Wahoo and Umbrella underwater explosions were more amazing than a atmospheric nuclear explosion.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QKHEv1&via=Digg&text=This Is What Happens When A Nuclear Bomb Explodes Under Water

div.div: UNREAL

div.a: Amazingly Realistic Pencil Drawings That Look Just Like Vintage Photos

div.div: An artist creates insanely detailed artworks that look just like old, fading, blurry, black-and-white photographs from decades ago.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U6wsLj&via=Digg&text=Amazingly Realistic Pencil Drawings That Look Just Like Vintage Photos

div.div: STELLAR GRAFFITI

div.a: Write Your Name In The Stars With Galactic Typography

div.div: A new site lets you play with galaxies, writing out any word or phrase using astronomical phenomena that happen to look like letters.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SBE2Cp&via=Digg&text=Write Your Name In The Stars With Galactic Typography
